Class Invoice

  • java.lang.Object
    • base.Base
      • features.Invoice

  • public class Invoice
extends Base

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Invoice(java.lang.String authKey, java.lang.String implementation)
      Constructor Class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      InvoiceObject addInvoice(ClientObject clientObject, java.lang.String dueDate, java.lang.String feeBearer, Item item)
      Add a new invoice of the supplied item for the specified client.
      The format of the dueDate is MM/DD/YYYY.
      The feeBearer should either be FeeBearer.ACCOUNT or FeeBearer.
      ResponseParser deleteInvoice(java.lang.String referenceCode)
      Deletes the invoice represented by the specified reference code
      InvoiceObject getInvoice(java.lang.String referenceCode)
      Returns an InvoiceObject depending on the reference code provided.
      java.util.List<InvoiceObject> getInvoiceHistory(java.lang.String period)
      Retrieves invoices saved within the range of the specified period.
      Period should be obtained from HistoryPeriod e.g: HistoryPeriod.TODAY
      java.util.List<InvoiceObject> getInvoiceHistory(java.lang.String startDate, java.lang.String endDate)
      Retrieves invoices saved within the specified date.
      Date should be written in the format DD/MM/YYYY e.g 23/05/2016
      InvoiceObject sendInvoice(java.lang.String referenceCode)
      Sends the invoice specified by the reference code to the customer the invoice is meant for.

        public Invoice(java.lang.String authKey,
               java.lang.String implementation)
        throws AuthenticationException,

        Constructor Class.
        The authentication key is used to validate requests.
        Implementation should either be Implementation.LIVE or Implementation.DEMO
